songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Yelawolf]
I got nuts on the mic, you can hear it in Stereo
Seem em' in Bama' from motherfuckin' Ontario
Beast to en cherry oh, balancin from the swinging roll
There it goes Catfish Billy make 'em go hysterical
Got em dizzy and really get it like Merry go
Rounds with pound of that babbage packing in every show
Sound,yeah I sound like a savage heavens can let 'em go
You ain’t a big foot you just in yeti clothes Bet your mama' smokin' newports with her hair in rolls
Spaghetti’s ready rockin jellies with the (heritos)?
Ain’t you a gumma star, bet you got a pair of those
But these nutz are big oh man and there’s no comparin’ those

(Hook)

Gotta lotta juice, big cups
Runnin over muther fuckas in a big truck
Lookin dead in the face, bitch what?
Big nuts Yeah
Big nuts Yeah
Big nuts yeah
Big nuts yeah
Big nuts
Slap the shit out the biggest muther fucker in the room
Disrespectin my family I got big nutz
Gotta lotta juice, big cups
Bitch what?
Big nuts

(Verse 2: Yelawolf)

Some people wanna rise when people talk shit I get so frustrated
Everybody things that I got rich and I walk around like I’m fuckin made
Pull out the alcohol lookin for it in a few makin feel subjugated
Askin me about a rap beat? who? what? when? where? why? was my lady?
Want me to snap out snap quick bitch go grab Jack, I’m fuckin crazy
If I gotta get go man I'mma make a grown feel like such a baby
If you get too close then I'mma have to back you up cuz I’m suffocating
Feel safe runnin that mouth cuz I got crowd when I’m out in public place
Say Yelawolf, what’s the lates? Ain’t shit up in the gas pipe
But I’m still livin the fast life in my own name and I’m doin aight
Fuckin A!
If it’s a game, then I’m in the game and I'mma and I’m in the front pine
Cuz I love to play!
Dudes I’m fuckin' paid and I know you love to hate me biiiiitch

(Hook)

Gotta lotta juice, big cups
Runnin over muther fuckas in a big truck
Lookin dead in the face, bitch what?
Big nuts Yeah
Big nuts Yeah
Big nuts yeah
Big nuts yeah
Big nuts
Slap the shit out the biggest muther fucker in the room
Disrespectin my family
I got big nutz
Gotta lotta juice, big cups
Bitch what?
Big nuts
songs.title: Big Nutz
